DOC.brief_summary: To learn whether FDG PET/CT and DCE MRI are better predictors of response to therapy than the current standard of care (CT or MRI).
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Sunitinib Therapy in Renal Cell Carcinoma Using F-18 FDG PET/CT and DCE MRI
DOC.criteria: Measurable disease by RECIST criteria Pathologic diagnosis of renal cell cancer Advanced (stage IV) renal cell cancer Karnofsky performance status of (KPS>70) Consent to participate in the clinical trial Patients who cannot complete a PET/CT scan. Pregnant women. Healthy volunteers. Patients participating in other research protocols will be excluded from this study. Metallic implants (prosthesis, ICD, pacemakers), since these are contraindications for MRI.
